text_logic_form: Point $P$ is the centroid of triangle $ACE$.
The length of the line $PF$ is $6$ units.
The length of the line $AD$ is $15$ units.
dissolved_text_logic_form: Point $P$ is the centroid of triangle $ACE$.
The length of the line $PF$ is $6$ units.
The length of the line $AD$ is $15$ units.
diagram_logic_form: Point $F$ lies on the line connecting $E$ and $A$.
Point $D$ lies on the line connecting $E$ and $C$.
Point $P$ lies on the line connecting $E$ and $B$.
Point $B$ lies on the line connecting $A$ and $C$.
Point $P$ also lies on the line connecting $A$ and $D$.
Point $P$ also lies on the line connecting $C$ and $F$.
line_instances: There are lines $EA$, $EC$, $EP$, $EF$, $ED$, $EB$, $AC$, $AP$, $AF$, $AD$, $AB$, $CP$, $CF$, $CD$, $CB$, $PF$, $PD$, and $PB$ forming the triangle and its segments.
